tweet: Tomorrow, China will institute another round of tariffs on American goods. This is not what winning a trade war looks like. Dangerous weather can happen anytime, anywhere. Please take time to create a severe weather plan for you and your family. #PrepareTogether pic.twitter.com/CNaBPlOzJD

Today we remember and honor America’s veterans who made the ultimate sacrifice. We are the land of the free because of the brave men and women who served and continue to serve in the U.S. Armed Forces. Our nation is forever grateful for your service. #MemorialDay

Proud to wear a yellow rose today in honor of the 100th Anniversary of the House vote guaranteeing women's voting rights. Great advances have been achieved but much work remains to protect voting rights and ensure equality for all.  #WomensVote100 #19thAmendment pic.twitter.com/xmeXnw41dK

Fairness & equality are fundamental American values. Proud to join my colleagues in voting today to make those same values the law of the land by passing #HR5, the #EqualityAct. pic.twitter.com/0DMgtEGcwT

Thousands of Georgians are struggling to keep up with the rapidly rising cost of prescription drugs. Last year, nearly 30% of all Americans skipped doses due to the high costs alone. Happy Mother’s Day to all of the wonderful moms of #GA13! May your day be filled with joy and happiness. pic.twitter.com/pEwynMSeI6

When disaster strikes, all Americans deserve to know that their government is there for them.
